DOC.criteria: 1.Newborn infant birth weight > 500 gm . 2.Gestational age > 24 complete week . 3.Intention manage infant noninvasive respiratory support ( i.e . endotracheal tube ) , either : 1 ) infant within first 7 day life never intubate receive less 24 hour total cumulative intubate respiratory support ; 2 ) infant within first 28 day life , manage intubated respiratory support 24 hour candidate extubation follow noninvasive respiratory support . 4.No known lethal congenital anomaly genetic syndrome . 5.Signed parental inform consent 1.Considered nonviable clinician ( decision administer effective therapy ) 2.Lifethreatening congenital abnormality include congenital heart disease ( exclude patent ductus arteriosis ) 3.Infants know require surgical treatment 4.Abnormalities upper low airway 5.Neuromuscular disorder 6.Infants > 28 day old continue require mechanical ventilation endotracheal tube
